website_summaries.verdict: The reasonably priced Gogogate2 supports nearly every function you'd want in a smart garage, though several rely on IFTTT applets.
pros: The Gogogate2 is a capable garage controller that supports up to three doors at once and works with third-party cameras for live images in the Gogogate app
cons: Setup is a bit tedious on the app and connectivity side, and you'll need IFTTT applets to use voice assistants or to set up geofencing

customer_reviews.title: Missing part, silence from customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to get it installed and working as the unit I received did not come with a wireless sensor as advertised. I contacted gogogate's customer service and at first the responded quickly asking me for more details and pictures but for several days now I've not been able to get any response from them. As of now it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love mine. I purchased it because I'd walk out ...
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. I purchased it because I'd walk out and find my garage door was open all night; with all my tools just waiting for the world's free-est garage sale. I'd recommend wired sensors. Wired because I live in a colder winter climate and batteries don't like cold and also maintenance replacing batteries is boring. I've not had to replace batteries yet, and I've not had issues yet.. just a worry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Emails Now Work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, and it works well. But if you are counting on the email notifications, they come out of order and sometimes days after the event. This makes them worthless. Often, I have to manually check the status of the garage door, after I receive a "Garage Door Open" email hours or days after the actual event. GoGoGate needs to implement a message queuing service for their email notifications to users to guarantee delivery in the original order as the events really occur. Update 1/1/2019- GoGoGate has evidently made changes to their email notification system and it now works effectively. The messages are delivered in a timely fashion, and in the correct order. Way to go GoGoGate!
customer_reviews.author: K. Holroyd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product very useful and a MUST if you are looking for a smart home
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have it running and it has saved me lots of trouble opening even when I'm not home!. You should only be aware that there are two versions of this product. One comes with wireless sensor and the other one has the wired one. One normally would think they are the same, but THEY ARE NOT!. I bought the wireless sensor and it is a tilt sensor, working only for doors that open upwards. I have an sliding door and I cannot use the sensor. later I bought another gogogate with the wired sensor and this actually work for my door. Just keep this in mind when purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Evil_Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in about 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in about 3 months. No customer service at all. No number to call. Remsol did not respond to the email.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, app could use an update
customer_reviews.text: We had occasional trouble with our in-vehicle Homelink openers, and wanted this opener as a backup (in addition to occasionally wanting to be able to open and close the door remotely). It was a breeze to install (:30 minutes or less) and easy to understand. Works perfectly, and as expected. The app software is a little dated in appearance, but it works. A simple update to the user interface would make this an outstanding product, though it works fine in its current form.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised, it monitors the status of the doors, produces notification and can even be programmed to act on geofencing info. The setup was almost straightforward, but some confusion is generated with the wifi setup, no big deal, just read very carefully all the instructions and notifications from the computer and phone during setup. One small setback is that although it controls three doors it comes with only one wifi sensor. Had to buy a second one for $34 found I needed is an extension power cord for the device. It comes with a too short (for me) power cord. I had to buy an extension
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoGoGetIt!
customer_reviews.text: I finally pulled the trigger after looking at quite a few other products out their. What I loved about GoGoGarage was the Phone App/GeoFencing ability by using IFFT (VERY easy to set up)/Alexa and also the reminders you can set if the door is open for an extended period of time. I also like the fact you can hook the item up directly to your opener and not "have" to hook it up to your open/close switch (just looks messy if you go that route). I have had this up and running for two weeks with zero issues/glitches. Time will tell, but very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: When I initially tested the gogogate (prior to installing) I found that the wireless door position sensor was not responding consistently to tilt inputs. I contacted the service department and described the problem and they immediately responded by sending me a new sensor. The new sensor worked fine and I have now installed the unit and it works just as it is supposed to. This is a life saver for me because I can use it to remotely monitor and control my garage door from anywhere. It is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoor gates
customer_reviews.text: This device has required a complete redo of my outdoor electrical setup. None of the components of the gogogate2 are weather resistant and must be enclosed in weatherproof boxes and the wires run through conduit. The plug for this thing doesn’t fit in a single gang outlet box and you need an outlet literally inches from your gate controller box. The wires coming from gogogate2 are too short to run from another box to a controller box. Unless your gate controller comes in a box large enough to accommodate the Gogogate2 device AND happens to have an available outlet already inside, this is a complicated install and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when you can find one
customer_reviews.text: One of my sensors had failed (I have 2 doors) and it took me several weeks to find the correct replacement. I ordered one from Amazon, shipped by a third party, and it turned out to be for the iSmart system rather than the GoGoGate 2 that was advertised. This item disappeared from Amazon for a short period of time after that. Other online merchants showed the item as unavailable. I was beginning to think that GoGoGate had abandoned their existing customers right after introducing their new iSmart system. This time I received the correct part (apparently from GoGoGate directly this time) and it woks like it is supposed to. WE shall see how long GoGoGate supports the older system
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY MORE FEATURES THAN MYQ
customer_reviews.text: I have MyQ at my house and GoGoGate2 at my mom's house. By far, GoGoGate2 works better and has MULTI-USER support with detailed schedules you can set that will allow the garage door to open or not open during specific times. MyQ has NO way to add any users. You can only use MyQ on 1 phone (or share out your MyQ username to multiple users which is not Ideal. MyQ does not require to be hard wire, while GoGoGate does. That is the only thing MyQ does better. Make sure you check your compatibility first!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Preferred over Chamberlain MyQ
customer_reviews.text: Prior to owning this, I had a Chamberlain MyQ. I bought this for it's excellent IFTTT integration. That integration allows you to both open and close the door with Google Assistant or Alexa, whereas MyQ only allows you to close the door with your voice. This product works well, though it is more techie looking than the MyQ (e.g. this one has more blinking lights). The Android app for this is very clunky for doing anything beyond opening and closing the door (i.e. any configuration settings). The support people are very nice. I had a problem with one of my door sensors and they sent me a new one free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gariano

customer_reviews.title: Setup super simple using your phone and step by step
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly. Setup super simple using your phone and step by step. IFTTT integration works perfectly (ok google, open my garage). Kids have their own account on their phone, so they can configure their own IFTTT integration, and I have an exact history of who is opening the garage. A detail could be improved for nerd like me, IFTTT just have actions: open and close. I'd like triggers as well: "Sensor detects opening / closing", "XXXX just opened/closed the garage". This would make it the perfect system.
customer_reviews.author: MAZUEL LAURENT

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this unit as it works great for my gate.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this unit, it arrived in a couple days and install was pretty simple by following directions and a week later I'm very impressed with the performance and how this unit works. No complaints this far, hope this continues like this. One thing I want to mention is that I have this unit installed for a gate (not a garage door), so the unit is outside but in a gate operator box (which I'm thinking gets extremely hot in the summers here in Sacramento), so I'm concerned about longevity of the device in extreme temps, but we'll see, so far it's been nothing short of great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Manea

customer_reviews.title: installation and setup was painful, reactivity is slow
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is ok, and is functional. The reactivity is pretty slow, the wifi signal pick up is week. very poor instruction set. the user interface looks dated, the device is geared for mobile users, but the app looks like an adaptive app that is non-native ios making the form factor crapped out. I could barely see the interface inputs and read them. Overall, this is a poor product. But it is still functional if you still want to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cokha

customer_reviews.title: Truely fantastic product for automating control of the garage door.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy, took about 5 minutes, and the app walks you right through it. I integrated it with IFTTT and have it set up to open when I get close to home and close when I leave. Of all the options to create this type of automation this was by far the cheapest and easiest I could find.
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Spent some time this weekend installing the WiFi-enabled GGG2 garage door kit from GoGogate. I can now open or close the door using a mobile app, through an Alexa skill, or automatically via IFTTT triggers and geo-fencing. It was super easy to install and I couldn't be happier with the results! Definitely recommended for anyone who wants to give their garage door opener some much needed smarts.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem ready for prime time. Only after buying it, and hearing back from their tech support(which only works during normal working hours), did I find out that it does not connect to Apple very well. After a week of trying to work with their support, did I return it. It shouldn't be that hard to connect. I will give it to them for the easy physical connection of tying right into the door switch, that is a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Brems

customer_reviews.title: No support what so ever after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Mine last over 2 years before it died. It wasnt with heavy usage, mainly served as a backup when someone forgot the opener. It no longer has any status lights nor wifi light. Contactes support and they said the same thing online the online trouble shooter stated, reflash the sd card. Did that and verified the data. No go. No other suggestions to try, nothing. Only offered a 15% discount to their new line the Ismart Gate. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: slowone

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for less than a year and it has completely stopped working. It won’t connect to my WiFi and has been painfully difficult to use. It doesn’t truly integrate with Alexa - it integrates with IFTTT, which integrates cleanly with Alexa. Both the hardware and the iOS app feel very beta - it’s a raspberry pi stuck in an enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Impossible and horrible instructions. I spent 4 hours on the archaic technology. The instructions are on the iPhone only and have way too many steps. Many of the steps don't work and you have to start all over again - it does not save your info !! In short, the connection to the device and/or the sensor (complete separate instructions) did not work. Not much thought gone into putting this gadget together.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP2020

customer_reviews.title: Best option to control your garage door remotely
customer_reviews.text: This device has exceeded my expectations. Not only was it easy to install, setup, and configure, but it does everything that I needed it to do. It connects to your wifi but is controllable remotely through the Internet. Furthermore, it is also compatible with IFTTT. It also shows that current status of the garage door (whether Open or Closed).
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Tshudy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item with tons of options and potential
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and fast installation. It only took me 10 minutes. The setup via the app was east and fast as well. The app could use some updates, but I know that will come in time. I like that this supports IFTTT so I can do things like have the garage door open when I get close to home, or make sure my garage is closed before I go to bed if I forget to do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one so much, I bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: I like the one for my gate so much I bought another one for my garage. So love the fact it works flawlessly with Alexa and now with Google Assistant. I just have to ask my phone to open the garage, no fumbling for the remote. The installation was super easy - took only around 10 minutes. Works perfectly with IFTTT. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg de Vries

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple with the step by step instructions they have on their website. I mounted mine up by the opener so it's kind of hidden, but still can see it to check the lights if I need to. Comes with an adhesive backing to mount it but I went ahead and ran a couple of tie wraps around it just to make sure. I initially was looking at the MyQ controller until I read they charge a fee to use it with IFTTT, this controller doesn't charge for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Gogogate 2
customer_reviews.text: So far, its works fantastic. No subscription with a regular house with 3 occupants. I have a house with a 2 car garage and a separate 2 car garage. I ran the opener wires to the house from the separate garage and connected the Gogogate2 to both garage doors. I ordered the model with wired sensors plus an extra sensor. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: jaxmike

customer_reviews.title: Tought to set up, need good WIFI range to make it work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set up. Product did not come with instructions, rather I had to look them up on line. When setting it up using WIFI, the signal from my router was not strong enough, so I had to set it up as stand alone. For the SSID to appear as an available network when pulling up to the garage, you have to wait 30 seconds. By that time I could go open the garage door manually. GoGoGate, Could do something about extending the range of the device so it can connect to my in home network.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Right

customer_reviews.title: Might take a little work to setup but works great
customer_reviews.text: Very good instructions and got it setup and works great with Alexa, IFTTT, and it's own application. Knocked off a star due to the fact I could not use my Pixel 2XL to set it up. Thank goodness my wife had a Pixel as that was what was used to set it up. Once setup my 2XL works with the app. Also had to make sure our phones are set on the 2.4ghz network over my 5 ghz.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product - configuration slightly tricky
customer_reviews.text: Remote access was a little tricky and I had to contact their customer service to find out that in order to get home automation to work correctly (IFTTT for example) you need to configure Gogogate with a "Static" IP address (particularly, the DNS address of your router). By the way, there doesn't appear to be any phone support - only email. But they seem to be responsive. Otherwise, I like the features of Gogogate. Far superior to my old Chamberlain MyQ.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bubeck

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting it to work with IFTTT and Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Literally spent hours downloading the gogogate apps and the IFTTT and trying to get the two garage doors to open and close with Alexa. I've been using computers for more than 30 years. It isn't supposed to be this hard. In the end, my phone showed one door closed with it was open. Telling Alexa to open an door did nothing. But when the door was open, telling it to close did nothing. Telling it to open then closed it. In the end life is too short to spend anymore time on this. And of course, the company won't take their non-working product back. Great. Don't waste your money. There are other choices. They couldn't be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Harlin Parker

customer_reviews.title: It works, it's cool, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have an Apple Airport network. Did two sliding gates. I'm pretty smart about networks and wiring things and I'd say someone with less than above average skills would get frustrated. No fault of GoGo, it's just a tricky cool thing they're doing. Read one review where guy complained about how reliably it stays on the lan and wan, I have to agree. BUT, and a big but, it does mostly work. And I'm sure they will work out some more of the kinks. At least someone is doing it. Would not suggest as the ONLY way to open an important gate. But when it is working, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fremont

customer_reviews.title: This is an easy install, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy install, easy setup, and it works perfectly. We would love to see the app refined and cleaned up a bit though - and the ability to search or sort opener history in some way. Right now its just a long scroll of activities - if you wanted to see a door trigger from a week ago, you have to scroll through them all to that point. App issues aside, this product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim I.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Whenever garage door is open or close I get notifications on my phone/watch. I no longer worry about leaving garage door open when driving away for a long time. It has a nice feature of sending reminders about garage “still open” when it is left open for extended periods of time. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: RF=GOAT

customer_reviews.title: Security vulnerabilities identified during network security scan of this product
customer_reviews.text: According to the Bitdefender security scan I ran on this product, it is vulnerable to both a memory overload issue and to a device lock-out vulnerability. I alerted the product group through their tech support over a year ago to the memory overload issue. As of the current version of firmware, it hasn't been corrected. Product works great, I just don't want to give someone a backdoor into my network, or, get locked out of my garage. The firmware was current as of this scan.
customer_reviews.author: DML1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, problem with amazon...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Easy install, works as describe. NOTE: A little upset with Amazon - the product was probably a return, expected new.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Quality and service
customer_reviews.text: This device has been the best buy for me. It has gone through power outages with human mistakes and it just continues to work solidly.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up directly to my wall mounted garage door opener buttons in the garage. Works perfectly. Bought an additional sensor for a 2nd garage. No issues in almost a year. Great to get the notifications that the garage has been open for 10 min. Has definitely saved us and allowed us to close it from work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marschke

customer_reviews.title: great device, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: great device, easy to install, works with old garages, and you can check from internet if your garage door is open or close, all in real time, and you can close or open your garage door from wherever if you have mobile internet in your smartphone, also I love the light that warns taht the garage door is about to open.
customer_reviews.author: Quake

customer_reviews.title: Seller: Eclectic Products :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought it via seller called Eclectic Products. When I tried to install it after a month of purchase, I found that the device is faulty and doesn’t work. The seller refuse to refund/ replace the device as the purchase exceeded a month time. Shame on you, rather offering good service. What frustrate more that Amazon just leave you to deal with their seller directly, without protecting their customers rights.
customer_reviews.author: A.S

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ECHO.... No Alexa Skill!!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ECHO.... There is no Alexa skill at this time. It clearly says that this is compatible with Alexa!!!! It is not, it requires IFTTT thus you can't control using Alexa app or adds to rotutine !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and operation
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I got this unit setup and running in less than 30 minutes. The app works flawlessly but is a little slow. Linked this to Alexa via IFTTT with no issues. Looking forward to always being assured that our garage is always closed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, great customer support!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I had an issue with the wireless sensor not working, but customer support shipped me a replacement within few days and it worked perfectly. The software is easy to use and connects fast to the main unit.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got the main gogogate2 for my main garage and it works so well that I decided to purchase the add on for my single stall garage door. Had troubles with installing it at first due to my WiFi, but tech support helped out in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product along with app for phone to easily open/close garage doors and monitor status
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Gogogate 1. I liked it, but it had its limitations. This #2 is wonderful. Easy to setup -- only little problems that were easily addressed, including using the online FAQ. The door sensors are a simple attachment -- I mounted to two garage doors. With the original version, it took a long time for the iPhone app to connect with my home Wifi when I rode up to the door and even longer to then connect "offline". This #2 iteration connects quickly. Really like the monitoring of the door status. Easy to make sure they're closed and it will also notify you of their status on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Herf_rio

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted... perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super-Easy installation. I wired it to my old Overhead Door Company opener (wired in the same place the doorbell-like button wires in) in less than 5 minutes. The app was easy to configure as well. Overall, maybe 10-15 minutes from the time I opened my box until I had it up and working. I've shared the app with all family members, so everyone has it on their smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: jimnipp

customer_reviews.title: installation was easy. Only issue I had was with the open/close ...
customer_reviews.text: Read instructions, followed instructions, installation was easy. Only issue I had was with the open/close sensors based on my style of gate. The pillar/hinge/gate are wider than 1.25 inches so I had to get creative with that piece. Otherwise it works great and I was able to integrate my Reolink camera with it following instructions provided by Reolink. IFTTT also worked with our Alexa device. GogoGate support was great as well. I have mine powered by a 12volt battery vs using the factory transformer. Support recommend a cheap part on Amazon to make this work properly.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Was able to use it on a garage motor that myQ by chamberlain didn’t support. Has made my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, lots of lights, does the job
customer_reviews.text: This unit is odd looking and only comes with tape to mount. It has a strobe light that flashes when you use the app to close the door. The wifi dongle constantly flashes blue, and theres a green and red led that always flash as well. It seems cheaply made and is pretty awkward looking, I wish I could conceal it somewhere but it's acting as a night light in my garage now. You have to use IFFT for Alexa to control it, it's not an Alexa skill, so voice command has quite a bit of a delay. But otherwise, it does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for perfect operation. The remote set up and operation of ...
customer_reviews.text: The Gogogate controller works as advertised with my two (2) Liftmaster 3280 garage door openers and my Centurion Evo5 entrance gate controller. The Liftmaster 885LM wall mounted push button dooesn't have terminals allocated for the connection to the Gogogate controller; however, the Gogogate support team, quickly responded to my query, and showed me where the wire could be soldered on to the wall mount push button, for perfect operation. The remote set up and operation of the Gogogate controller, from my Smart phone was quick and easy. It operates quickly as advertised over any remote internet connection. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed on my Craftsman Garage door opener. Works really well. I especially like getting notifications when the door opens and closes. IFTTT and Alex functionality is easy to setup and works quite well. With an Apple Watch it really shines.Within seconds of leaving home I am reminded that the door closed, averting any self doubt on my part that I did in fact close the door. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. From the get go I have had issues. Sometimes it worked, sometimes it didn’t. Used to be able to reset, now it won’t even allow that. Delete device and reinstall and now all I get is this timed out error message. All my other WiFi devices work but this one. What a waste. Sad I can’t recover my money.
customer_reviews.author: charles roderick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this over other smart garage door openers. This thing is amazing, easy to install and even got a camera to go with it. Although its opened twice on me at night and stayed open until I left for work in the morning. It maybe this unit or it could be the IFTT app I use to automatically open the garage door when I get home. I still love it either way! wow, forgot all about this post! It was the IFTT app that kept opening the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Bmac

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to install but would be better if ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install but would be better if dc power cable was longer. Voice command a bit tricky to remember alexa "trigger open/close garage" from a function standpoint 5 stars. I tested it with the app all the way from remote Thailand. No more driving back home to see if I forgot to close it!
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Maston

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a bit of a challenge, but working fine once installed. Using it with IFTTT so I no longer need a remote hanging on my visor to open the door, I just drive into the area I set on the map and it opens the door for me. Also integrated with Alexa, so I can ask it to open or close the door as needed. I have Blink cameras installed, as well as the August doorbell, so I can let delivery people in no matter where I'm at.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, poor interface.
customer_reviews.text: Tool itself works great! What I got issues with is the interface. Mobile app is pretty bad. No support for alexa, google or siri. IFTTT is quite limited for what can you actually do. Good tool to verify that your door are close but poor choice from home automation point of view. The fact that it can be managed and operated only from mobile device (not accessible in browser or no desktop app) is another disappointment. Works okay - if there will be any update released that will expand functionality than I'll edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub Walsh

customer_reviews.title: These sensors are terrible, I have 5 gagrage doors and have been ...
customer_reviews.text: These sensors are terrible, I have 5 gagrage doors and have been in contact with tech support time and time again. they always respond with "its very unusual to have a defective unit" but I have gone through a total of 12! to get 5 that work.
customer_reviews.author: Merdav

customer_reviews.title: Weak Customer service. Broke after 3 months of Use.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for about 3 months then broke. The customer service is weak at best and didn't really back up their product. I would not recommend this product. I will say that when it worked, it was a neat tool. Maybe newer versions and better customer service and they could be on to something.
customer_reviews.author: John D Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: No more worries
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved my marriage! Wife would also ask me if garage door was closed AFTER we were already in bed. Now I get notified when anyone comes or goes and I use IFTTT to schedule it to automatically close every night before bed. It can control multiple door (although I am currently using it on only one). You can attach camera to see what is happening, but I use a separate camera in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Fozbot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!!! works great!!! when our gate is opened or closed we are notified on our I phone the moment it occurs No matter where we are
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: I have to reconnect everyday, it times out. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to reconnect everyday, it times out. Plus, it will not hook up to IFTTT to connect Amazon Alexa. I wish I could return, but I don't have the box. Rip off, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Vallance

customer_reviews.title: works half the time
customer_reviews.text: when it works, it just ok. sometimes it takes a long time to connect. the other half of the time it doesn't connect. it makes me crazy. it's disconnected now and i just use a key pad.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Gogo gate customer service not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Had a few questions on the install. The staff at gogo gate were not overly helpful. I figured it out. Their customer service was rude and of no help.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service help me get it to work and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the more complicated things that I have installed,, but their tech support (Elizabeth) help guide me through it. Once we got the wiring correct, it was a piece of cake. We exchanged photos of the gate controller, they sent back the photos with arrow and captions. But it works and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device. Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the device. Installing it on my garage door opener was a little more complicated than expected, owing to the fact that my garage door opener uses a proprietary system to connect to the control. As a result, installation required soldering the connection to the Gogogate directly to the control's circuit board. However, Gogogate's customer support was excellent and guided me through the entire process. They replied to my request for help within a couple of hours with full instructions, and have been following up to check that everything worked. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cobo

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: It will not connect to our WIFI I'm not happy with this at all. I even called and had my internet upgraded to no avail. All this took so long I'm unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: JIM MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get this to connect. I tried 2 different iphones and an ipad. It seemed that the installation would have been fairly easy but I never got to that point. I wish it worked. I would consider myself pretty tech savvy. I have several echo and home automation devises. This is the only product that I have ever bought from Amazon that didnt have an option to return. $99 paper weight
customer_reviews.author: Cgratteau

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk and tech support is terrible. Unplugged it for a day and it stopped working. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: S. Rittenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy, but make sure you enter network name as ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, but make sure you enter network name as case sensitive. Watch the installation videos first. Device works as advertised. I attached mine to the push button opener. Great product at a reasonable price. Make sure you get the door sensor for full capability. It was included with the Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ISU Bob

customer_reviews.title: Alexa feature sucks
customer_reviews.text: It works great on its own but not what I bought it for. I bought it for the Alexa feature and you have to use a third party app called ifttt which works with a bunch of other apps just not gogogate2. It will never log into the gogogate2 app. It keeps saying remote access is disabled and it clearly isn’t. If they fix this issue I will give them an absolute 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: This is great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is great and easy to install. I actually install mine directly to the garage opener that way it was closer to de outlet and out of sight at the ceiling. The only downside is that is not as fast and effective as a remote, and if your wifi does not reach or work properly you have no way to open the garage from outside
customer_reviews.author: Karls M.

customer_reviews.title: Open and close relay it takes no time to see if gate closes or not.
customer_reviews.text: WiFi this is probably the best in the market for gates. I buy a few before with useless sensors difficult to set up. Almost impossible for gates. This clicks relay to open or close with out the use of the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty in connecting my wireless Gogogate 2
customer_reviews.text: Considering the product I purchased, it appears that another component needs to be attached to it to function which I don't have because it cannot connect to wifi and the manual I found is no explicit on this product likewise any video no how to connect it on YouTube. I'm confused. Badly need help. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great System for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent security and convenience system. It worked so well at my home that I installed two more at my daughters homes. It sends out text and email reminders if the door is open too long and notifies you if the door unexpectedly is opened.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Works. But installating the limit switch can be challenging.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. I used it for a gate. The installation was more effort and thought than I expected. It is critical to place the limit switch at the correct place. I will have to redo my setup since the gate chain is slightly loose, and will have to redo the limit switch installation to make it more tolerant of the shifting gate end point caused by the loose gate chain. The product worked as expected. Maybe there should be a better installation guide for the limit switch installation.
customer_reviews.author: NeerajKhurana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad that I bought this.Was very easy to install,app is also very user friendly.Great product.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: BORA K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Decent build quality and a very good app!! I had a garageio and sent it back because the gogogate 2 was far more reliable and better quality. Not to mention the gogogate was cheaper! My only complaint is that the installation instructions could be better. I did not hoot the gogogate to the wall switches, but instead to the opener itself. This was not clear, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: The app is useless. It couldn't do the basics of even connect or find the Gogogate unit. Absolute complete waste of my time and is being sent back asap for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Totes Wild

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation and just works.
customer_reviews.text: Looking at other reviews, Gogogate must have improved their installation instructions because they were insanely easy to follow. Gogogate2 does everything as advertised, connects flawlessly with any home automation with IFTTT, and just works. Now when I'm .2 miles from my house, my garage door will open, which definitely saves time when on a motorcycle. It also auto closes when I leave my house, just in case I forget to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom

customer_reviews.title: When the 300+ MHz band is not useful
customer_reviews.text: Living next to an active base, the normal garage door frequencies were intermittently squashed. Even at a foot they would be inoperative. This operates on cell phone freq.s so is not stepped on (garage door range is smack against military bands). Works like a charm. Now get praises from my SO on making an aggravation go away. Also great if you have someone (e.g. dog sitter) and you forgot to leave a key. Works from your cell so you can let them in (or kids who forgot their keys).
customer_reviews.author: P. Grosshart

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and works great! This is a superior product. I did a lot of research on the various smart garage door tech that is available and settled on this one based on features and price. I love the IFTTT compatibility that allows geofencing and safety checks like "At 10pm, make sure my garage is closed." The app is simple and intuitive and even monitors the battery status of the remote sensor. Highly recommended! A+
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  There's lag time btwn prompting the door to open and opening but overall it works.
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to open and close garage door with out a traditional opener. If you always have your phone you'll always have a garage door opener.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one sensor I got had the incorrect ID. ...
customer_reviews.text: The one sensor I got had the incorrect ID. I had to have a remote computer session with Gogogate to figure it out although from my troubleshooting steps they correctly ID'd the problem.
customer_reviews.author: tbirdman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly fantastic all around. I can open my sliding driveway gate via gogogate and IFTTT by telling Siri “open gate” and it also works great with our pedestrian gate and door strike. Easy to use, easy to setup, and does exactly what it says. Great support too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schneider

customer_reviews.title: decent customer service but difficult to trouble shoot problem
customer_reviews.text: worked okay w one unit but could not get the second sensor to work after multiple hours and time with customer service they finally agreed it was defective. customer service attempted to solve problem but response was slow and we kept getting dropped off line Not due to my wifi but their software they were using
customer_reviews.author: packerfan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and great to use. I have apps on my phone and tablet, and also use Echo (Alexa) to open and close the garage door. I need to get another sensor for the second garage door, but Bestbuy never have them in stock. They have to be ordered. I have been lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: Pain to install and notices work sporadically
customer_reviews.text: This product was actually a bit of a nuisance to get set up. They advise you to set up the device on something other than the phone you will be using it on. The alerts are very sporadic and inconsistent. Also only the admin/owner can receive alerts...other users cannot.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Gogogate 2 Installation Issues
customer_reviews.text: product arrived late due to Amazon shipping issue. opened the packaging and started on the installation. I had already done some homework on this and new what I needed to do. Installation was pretty easy to setup and attach to my existing garage door opener. Took me maybe an hour or so to get the software setup and apply the update to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for power users
customer_reviews.text: Has worked flawlessly for me for over two years. Intergration with IFTTT makes nealry anything possible, for example I use it to automatically open our garage when we get home via connecting to our wifi network (limited to certain times) and to automatically close the door every night in case I forgot to do so.
customer_reviews.author: axlback

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Arrived used as expected but works great and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Arrived used as expected but works great and has good features. Took me a couple hours to figure out how to set up but is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Installation can take some time, but well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome opener
customer_reviews.text: Works very well from my Apple phone and watch. Absolutely love it! However, be warned that 3rd party geofencing doesn't work. Maybe someday...
customer_reviews.author: W. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Poor hardware
customer_reviews.text: Product failed two times during warranty sent replacement parts now has stopped working at all
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great! I do have some issues with it connecting to my internet at random times, but I believe it’s the internet and not this device.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Everything is working great now. I have a Wayne Dalton i-drive
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with installation of the app. Finally got the installation done and everything appears to be working. Except it won't open the garage door with my smartphone. Tried everything...finally with help from tech support, I had to hard wire to the garage door opener. This was so much easier then hooking up to wireless wall mount. Everything is working great now. I have a Wayne Dalton i-drive
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Could not make it work, complicated setup, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not make it work , complicated setup , and the wifi did not work , question of firewall issue. Just can't do much with it. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Not to hard to setup but the interface is a little lacking. No customer service phone number but email support is pretty good. I would buy this over the chamberlain door anyday.
customer_reviews.author: ral6767

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful IoT product!
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 minutes of unpacking the box, I had Gogogate2 up and running! No more worrying about whether or not the garage door is closed! The instructions are clear and simple. I added multiple users to enable everyone in the house to be able to control the garage using their smart phones. Nice, compact design. I had to use an extension cord to plug in the unit, other than that no issues at all during installation and configuration. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunder Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Had some trouble getting it to work but this has been great being able to use my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to monitor and control garage door.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Doesn't interface directly with alexa, however works great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: Gogogate 2 - Open and close your garage door remotely with your Smartphone via app (iPhone/Android), iFTTT or with voice with Amazon Alexa
product_meta.description:
Style:Garage Controller KitGogogate2 garage kit is a smart garage opener that will allow you to remotely open, close and control your garage door from anywhere through your Smartphone, Tablet, Smart Watch or PC. Monitor your garage door and get notified when door is open, closed or left open both via Smartphone or email. It is also possible to integrate your existing IP camera to control in real time what is happening in your garage when not around. If you missed an event, you can track it later in a built-in calendar and even see recorded videos. The Gogogate 2 device also provides you the possibility to grant or deny access to anyone from anywhere, restricting their access by time, location and garage door. Our product is compatible with iFTTT and Amazon Echo: Its easy installation is ideal to automatically open or close your garage door through GPS location or control it with your voice.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Your garage door Simpler. Smarter. Better. Open, close and monitor your garage door from anywhere. Gogogate2 is compatible with both garage doors and gates. The perfect solution to monitor the access to your home, office or warehouse. One Gogogate2 device can control up to three different garage doors or gates. Gogogate2 is compatible with most garage door openers except: Chamberlain, Craftsman, and Liftmaster models that have purple antenna.
feature_bullets: Remotely operation of garage doors and gates from Smartphone, Tablet or PC
Garage Door / Gate Status Monitoring (video feature optional)
Smartphone notifications for garage door events (open, close or left open). Easy to Install and program (Not Waterproof)
Access management: grant or deny access to your guests. Visual and auditive warning system for remote operation

Gogogate kit includes: 1 x Gogogate 2 controller, 3 x pre-assembled cables, 1 x US power adaptor, 1 x USB WiFi adaptor, 1 x double sided tapes, 1 x Quickstart Guide, 1 x Wireless sensor for sectional or tilt garage doors
Universal garage door controllers with wireless sensor included. Works on iPhone, Android phone, PC, Tablet and Apple Watch
Real time garage door status and temperature monitoring feature to know if door is open or closed. Remote Alerts on Smartphone and via email (Open, Left Open, Closed and Temperature)
Video Monitoring feature to integrate your existing IP camera to the device. See real time what happens in your garage and record all events (More than 1500 models compatible)
Access Management feature: grant and deny access up to 10 different users for free. Set different schedules and give access to different doors and video if necessary
Set different schedules and give access to different doors and video if necessary
Easy to install device and sensor. Compatible with both garage doors and gates. Single unit controls up to 3 different doors or gates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars412 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
